item.Name: use a single mixing board{unused smelly flag}

_field_block.name: sound references|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below

_field_tag_reference.name: model#optional. only allow this event when used on this model

_field_string_id.name: variant#optional. only allow this event when used on this model variant

_field_block.name: effect references|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below

_field_tag_reference.name: model#optional. only allow this event when used on this model

_field_string_id.name: variant#optional. only allow this event when used on this model variant

_field_block.name: blend screens|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in NEW blend screens tag below
animations*|ABCDCC

item.Name: use custom blend-in time#when possible, interpolate into this animation using the 'blend in' time value below
translate and scale root only#ignore all transtion and scale on all nodes except the root
enable blend-out on replacement anims#fade out this animation as they reach the end of the animation.
use custom blend-out time#when possible, fade this animation out over the 'blend out' time below (requires 'enable blend-out' above, replacement anims only)
override player input with motion#use the movement data in this anim instead of player physics (player only)

_field_real.name: override blend in time{override blend time}

item.Name: do not inherit for player graphs
allow ball-roll on foot#prevents foot-ik from settling

_field_block._field_explanation: If this animation contains PCA blend shape animation, provide the name of the PCA Group to which it belongs. These groups should be present in the PCA Groups block.
data which may be shared by one or more animations

_field_block.name: shared animation data
_field_block._field_explanation: IMPORTANT NOTES ABOUT FRAME EVENTS 1) The following four fields (hidden except in expert mode) are legacy Halo3-style tag blocks. 2) New frame events (attached to animations in Maya) will automagically be exported to the frame_event_list any time a model sidecar is imported with the tool import command. 3) Do not add new frame events, fx events, audio events, or dialog events here. Instead, please use the frame_event_list tag referenced in 'imported events' (it's right above the 'animations' tag block). 4) The only time you should be editing the following hidden fields is to remove legacy frame events that have been replaced by events generated in Maya.

_field_block.name: frame events|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below
sound events|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below
effect events|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below
dialogue events|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below
script events|ABCDCC!*#Legacy field - please edit in new frame event tag below

_field_real_fraction.name: interpolation rate:[0,1]#A value of zero or one means no interpolation.

item.Name: damage left shoulder{damage focus left shoulder}
damage left arm{damage focus left arm}
damage left leg{damage focus left leg}
damage left foot{damage focus left foot}
damage right shoulder{damage focus right shoulder}
damage right arm{damage focus right arm}
damage right leg{damage focus right leg}
damage right foot{damage focus right foot}

_field_short_block_index.name: weight function#Function applied to input from weight function source

_field_block.name: NEW function overlays|CCAABB

item.Name: strict looping#loop without blending the first and last frames

_field_block._field_explanation: Enter either or leave blank. Entering both will default to frame ratio option for playback control.

_field_string_id.name: intermediate gait name#animation name used for the speed variations
source marker#the marker name on this object where the point of attachment is
destination marker#the marker name of the attachment destination point

_field_short_integer.name: rank!#calculated during post process where rank is default ordinal for solving
antecedents!#calculated during post process where bit index represents chain index

plugin._field_explanation: For each PCA Group desired, provide a unique name and desired number of blend shapes. Then, assign animations to these groups by setting their pca group name field

This is where all the imported pca blend shape animation will be stored. If any animations in this graph contain PCA blend shape animation, create a unique pca_animation tag for this animation graph and link it here. Otherwise, one will be created for you.

_field_string_id.name: state name^#name of the state this transition starts in
mode name#name of the mode this transition ends in
state name#name of the state this transition ends in
marker#the marker name on the object being attached
attach to marker#the marker name object (weapon, vehicle, etc.) the above marker is being attached to

_field_real.name: animation parameter#Numerical value associated with the ranged action animation (e.g. velocity for jumps)

_field_string_id.name: marker#the marker name on the object being attached
attach to marker#the marker name object (weapon, vehicle, etc.) the above marker is being attached to

_field_block.name: vehicle suspension|CCAABB

_field_string_id.name: marker name#this marker should be parented to the vehicle root node
contact marker name#this marker should be parented to the wheel node

_field_real.name: mass point offset#distance along the vehicle's up direction to move the wheel from the marker location

_field_block._field_explanation: Only Necessary for suspensions with a destroyed state

plugin._field_explanation: fields used by varous compression codecs to store shared or global data for this graph. Do not manually edit.
